Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: Very exciting! I second the stretching that was suggested. Having good range of motion is so valuable for injury prevention. Practice listening to your body. (I’m injury-prone and not good at ‘hearing’ the warnings so I have to take things slower than I think I need to.) Try a variety of things and see what’s fun for you :) And most importantly, find some workout tunes that lift your spirits!

Author: stefanica
Text: Stretch. Don't do too much too quickly. Stretch. Hydrate! Pay attention to your breathing...in through the nose, out through the mouth. Stretch. But not too too much. Ease into it.
